model_config: ClassVar[SettingsConfigDict] = {'arbitrary_types_allowed': True, 'case_sensitive': False, 'env_file': '.env', 'env_file_encoding': 'utf-8', 'env_nested_delimiter': None, 'env_prefix': '', 'extra': 'ignore', 'protected_namespaces': ('model_', 'settings_'), 'secrets_dir': None, 'validate_default': True}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'ALGORITHM': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='HS256'), 'CLD_API_KEY': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=False, default=111111111111111), 'CLD_API_SECRET': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='secret'), 'CLD_NAME': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='abc'), 'MAIL_FROM': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='postgres'), 'MAIL_PASSWORD': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='postgres'), 'MAIL_PORT': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=False, default=567234), 'MAIL_SERVER': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='postgres'), 'MAIL_USERNAME': FieldInfo(annotation=EmailStr, required=False, default='postgres@meail.com'), 'REDIS_DOMAIN': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='localhost'), 'REDIS_PASSWORD': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[str, NoneType], required=False), 'REDIS_PORT': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=False, default=6379), 'SECRET_KEY_JWT': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='1234567890'), 'SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL': FieldInfo(annotation=str, required=False, default='postgresql+asyncpg://postgres:57234@localhost:5432/postgres')}¶

Metadata about the fields defined on the model, mapping of field names to [FieldInfo][pydantic.fields.FieldInfo].

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.

classmethod validate_algorithm(v: Any)¶
